inn1.comm: Two slips watch as Anderson swings the ball into the pads and it rolls away to the on side.
short in length and off the pad to the leg side ... If he can hurl it on a fuller length and swing it into Gautam it could get interesting
fuller, on a good length, coming in from the off stump line and Gambhir moves back to defend. Little more full James!
fuller and it swings into to hit the pad but it pitched just outside leg stump.

back of length and this one moves towards middle from the leg stump line and Gambhir is squared up trying to turn it to the on side and edges it to backward point. So there is swing and movement out there
ah.. pushes it way wide outside off stump.
on the leg and middle and flicked to right of Bopara at long leg for couple of runs.
136.4 kmph full in length and around the off and middle line and Sehwag gets forward to defend.
Sehwag is up and away. He was helped by the fact that the ball was on the leg and middle, hip high and Sehwag wristed it away front of square
138.5 kmph fuller, straighter, on the middle, turned to the on side for a single
around the off stump line, on a length and Gambhir pushes it out to the off side. Two slips in place.
in the outside-off channel and Gambhir lets Prior earn his money
around the middle and leg, Gambhir is wary of the movement across him and so, doesn't wrist it through the on side as he would have done on a flat trick and just taps it to the leg side
bounces almost chest high and Sehwag hops to defend it down to the on side
Criminal. Full and on the legs and Sehwag flicks it away to deep square leg boundary.
lovely delivery, around 139 kmph, in the zone just outside off stump and Sehwag covers his off stump and lets Prior gather

Shot. Fierce. It was a touch short in length and just outside off stump and Sehwag went back and flashed it past backward point. Bat swing. Whir. Blink. The ball is picked from the boundary. Sehwag special.
gets forward to defend a length delivery
hurls across a high bouncer outside off stump. Mr Tiffin extends his arms.
from slightly wide of the crease, 142.7 kmph full delivery on the middle and off line, Sehwag goes hard into his drive and edges it to square leg.
139.4 kmph down the leg side. Gambhir fails to connect with the flick.
138.3 kmph full delivery around middle and off line and Gambhir pushes it back to the bowler.
gets well forward to drive to mid-on.
moves into the line and works it straight to square leg
full and straight, 140.9 kmph delivery, on driven straight to mid-on
Gambhir, already standing outside the crease, walks down the wicket and guides to point
drives to wide mid-off, the bottom-hand coming off the handle and he takes the single.
Gambhir walks and picks the ball from the off stump line and lifts the ball just over mid-on, who is standing pretty close.
from wide of the crease, angling away from short of length and Gambhir cuts but is stopped by the diving backward point
good delivery this. It kicked up from back of length and squared up Gambhir. Prior collected chest high.
around 140 kmph delivery and Gambhir shoulders arms
on the middle stump line, jabbed behind square leg for a single. The run rate is around five. Remember, England won the toss and chose to field.
138.3 kmph, back of length delivery that bounced and Sehwag gets on top of the bounce to defend it to the off side of the pitch.

Slap. Gambhir charges down the track and flat-bats a short-of-length delivery to the left of mid-off. Again, he has moved down the track in the first ball of the over. England have to watch out. He does it repeatedly.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
fuller and outside off stump, Gambhir moves into the line, opens the bat face and guides it past the solitary slip. Steered deliberately. 2000 ODI runs.
moves into line to drive to covers
139.4 kmph full in length on the middle and off line, Gambhir steers it to point
Fab. Again that walk down the wicket. Broad pitches it short of length and on the middle but Gambhir had walked towards off, got outside the line and flicked it up and over square leg.
on the legs and he should consider himself lucky to get away with just two runs.
shifts his line to outside off, a touch short in length, Sehwag tries to punch it on the up through the off side but edges it down the wicket.
138.4 kmph length delivery around off stump and Sehwag fists it to mid-off
on the off and middle line, Sehwag stays back to work it towards wide mid-on for a single
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket

walk walk walk. Flick flick flick. Four four four. Sorry about that. It was so predictable from Gambhir. He should feature in the Johny Walker ad. He just walked down and across and flicked it over square leg.
Immediately Fred gets extra bounce and Sehwag has to get his bottom-hand out of the handle to keep it down and guides to backward point
cutting in with bounce and Sehwag taps it close on the off side, Gambhir wants a single, Sehwag says no no no
lovely teasing probing delivery that landed around the off stump and curved away. Sehwag went back and ended up pushing inside the line
a touch short in length and outside off stump, Sehwag went back and across, got too close to the ball, cramped himself and chopped it to backward point
moves forward to tap a full length delivery close on the leg side for a quick single
141.5 kmph back-of-length delivery, angling away from Gambhir who shoulders arms
drifts to the pads, worked behind square leg for a single
135.1 kmph length delivery moving in from the leg stump line, defended on the front foot
Gambhir walks. Harmison digs it shorter and gets bounce and it flies past the outside edge. Gambhir was looking to defend.
Even better delivery. It screamed from a length and bounced past Gambhir who was opened up completely
guided to backward point
works the short-of-length delivery to midwicket for a single
the tall bowlers are banging it short of length and trying to trouble the batsmen with the bounce. Gambhir hops to defend this one to defend
walks outside leg stump and carves a length delivery on off and middle over cover point. Delicious whack.
bounces this one into the rib cage and Gambhir wrists it behind square leg
coming into Sehwag who turns it behind square for a single
taps it close and they rush across for a quick single.
leans forward to defend to the off side
on a length, around middle and leg, turned to the leg side for a single.
139 kmph full length delivery around off stump, defended to covers
banged in short around the off stump and Sehwag plays the pull. The front leg is lifted in the air and the bat came down horizontally and the ball flies to deep square leg for a single
Botham drawls, "That's too wide and too full." Indeed. Gambhir eased it through covers.
in the zone outside off, angling away, left alone
leans forward to steer a back-of-length delivery to point
length delivery on the middle stump line, defended
full in length, coming in a bit from just outside off stump, Sehwag stayed adjacent to the line and dabbed it to point
similar delivery, taps it close on the off side and by the time Collingwood swoops on the ball, the batsmen rush across
Superb running between the wickets. Almost an yorker, dropped in front and off they go.
143.7 kmph, length delivery, homing in to the off stump, guided to backward point.
And Sehwag responds with a four. It was full, it was on the middle, tilting in and Sehwag whipped it through midwicket.
tries to tap it to third man but can't beat backward point
138.2 kmph back-of-length delivery whizzing past the off stump, left alone by Gambhir
walks down the track, Harmison pings his rib cage, Gambhir takes his bottom-hand off the bat handle and works the ball to fine leg
another one at the body, Sehwag fends it to short fine-leg region
lets the ball come to him, drops it to the off side, towards gully and they scamper across for yet another excellent single
another four in the last ball of the over. This one was on the hips and Sehwag moved inside to clip it to fine-leg boundary. The bowler want to fire it into the rib cage but was off target.
the left-arm spinner starts from over the stumps, turns it in from the off stump line, tapped to midwicket region for a single.
Sehwag gets forward to defend.
backs away a bit to make room and square drives to point. He is looking to go inside-out over covers. Watch out.
There he goes. Moves outside leg and lifts the ball from the leg stump line up and over covers
Sehwag comes down the track, Samit fires it in, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
full and on the leg and middle, turned straight to midwicket
full and slipping on to the pads, Sehwag misses the flick but it runs away off the pad to the boundary. Wrong line.
Even more down leg and Prior collects.
hmm again on the legs, tickled to right of Flintoff at fine-leg region
on the hips, tucked to fine-leg region. Broad is attacking the bum. He can find better places to fire his balls. Huh! I am really sorry.
banged in short, chest high and Sehwag hops across to tap it to the on side
length delivery around the off stump, tapped close on the off side, think about a single but change their minds
Banged in short but that doesn't help. Gambhir swivels to pull it over midwicket.
on the off stump line , pushed to cover point for a quick single.
leans forward to drive to long-on for a single
floated from round the stumps, Sehwag went for the slog sweep, missed it and hit the pad
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
down the track, Samit drags back the length and sehwag flat-bats it to Bopara at sweeper cover
down the track and Samit shortens the length without sacrificing the flight and Gambhir pushes it to midwicket
oh, hello, Sehwag greets him with a slog over mid-off for six, its all going terribly wrong for England this morning! Sehwag just clears the leg and swings, fab shot
carnage! And thats the 100 stand, and Sehwag's fifty with six more, this one disdainfully slogged over midwicket, what a batsman he is
clears the front leg, eying the midwicket region, but adjusts and slaps a cut shot out to the sweeper in the deep, just getting a single to rotate strike
full down the leg side and tickled down to fine leg for leg byes
full on middle and leg and pushed to Collingwood's left side
easily turned from leg stump wide of square leg and sprints hard
Disdain rulez. Sehwag is down the track and mistimes his drive to long-on
Gambhir pings the long-on for a single
down the leg side, anticipating Sehwag's dash down the track but our hero stays back to paddle it away to fine-leg boundary
This is some nets session. Sehwag charges, Samit shortens and Sehwag drags it to wide long-on boundary
drives inside out but straight to covers
he is going after every ball. Again another shimmy down the track. Patel this time slows up the pace and shortens the length and sehwag is made to wait and he drives to long-on for a single

shout for lbw. Perhaps the first shout of the day. It came in from a length, missed the forward prod and hit above the kneel roll on the leg stump line. Hawk eye suggests it would have clipped the top of the leg stump
gets behind this delivery to defend to the on side
Gambhir reaches his 12th ODI fifty with a dab to third man
full length delivery, straightening around the off stump, defended with the full face of the bat
probing line continues. On and around the off and middle, no room nor length to work with and Sehwag goes back to defend to the on side
very good over this. Again on that middle and off line and Sehwag defends.
comes down the track, almost yorks himself in the process and digs it out to the bowler
turning into off and middle line, dabbed to backward point
he is down the track and Patel keeps it full, driven to long-on for a single
tries to find the blockhole, whipped to deep midwicket

England have got their first wicket. Gambhir came down the track and chipped it to left of long-off. He didn't hit it hard, just sort of chipped it and couldn't find the distance. I didn't notice it but SMG on air says, "Sehwag gave him a mouthful for not hitting it hard!" There you go. Simple policy.
retains the strike with a drive down the ground
Flintoff continues to probe away. Super bowling considering the carnage going around. This was a length delivery, straightening outside off stump and Sehwag pushes inside the line
back of length and touch outside off stump, Sehwag cuts but is unable to find any room and ends up chopping it to backward point
137.9 kmph length delivery around the off stump, steered to backward point again
137.3 kmph banged in short of length and Sehwag hops to defend to the on side of the pitch
lovely delivery, curving away through the channel and Sehwag lets it go. "Great stuff from Flintoof," coos Gavaskar on air. And rightly so. Fab Fred.
it won't be a maiden over as Sehwag plays the killjoy by tapping it close on the off side for a quick single. Never mind that, though. A really good over from the big man.
floated on the leg and middle line, Sehwag reverse sweeps it to short third man for a single
leans forward to on drive to deep midwicket for a single
on the middle and leg, drifting in, worked past square leg
down the track and driven to long-on for yet another single
flighted full, really full, whipped to long-on. India move to 134
flighted full outside off, Raina retains the strike with a drive to long-on.
137.5 short-of-length delivery angling away from Raina, whp pushes at it, bat away from the body and the ball falls just short of Collingwood at backward point and squirts past him
Flintoff continues to harass Sehwag with that outside-off line. Sehwag shapes to defend but ends up being beaten by the late movement. Now a slip moves in. We got a contest folks.
Sehwag gets off strike with a defensive dab to the off side.
fuller, around the off stump, 143 kmph delivery and Raina pushes it to the off side
beaten on the cut. 141.2 kmph back-of-length delivery outside off and Raina tries to force it away off the back foot and misses. KP smiles.
superb delivery, fuller and curving in the air across Raina who somehow manages not to get squared up completely and edges to backward point.  Another brilliant over from Freddy

Meanwhile, the attack continues at the other end. Sehwag runs down the track and lifts over long-on. there is a fielder there but he needs to be in the stands to take that. Short boundaries here in Rajkot.
turned past square leg for a single
comes down the track, Patel gets it to dip on him and Raina lunges to push it down to long-off and brings Sehwag back on strike
Flamboyant inside-out drive. He backed to the leg side and flashed it inside-out over extra cover.
And the run orgy continues. Sehwag dashes down the track, getting outside leg in the process and pings the long-off boundary.

Bell takes a beauty at midwicket to get rid of the imperious Sehwag. England strike back. Sehwag is down the track but ends up dragging his big heave to the right of midwicket. Bell flung himself to his right and picked the ball inches off the turf. Supremely athletic effort. Great to watch. Entertaining innings comes to an end.
short of length and kicking up, defended to the off side
stays back to punch a back-of-length delivery to sweeper cover
137.8 kmph full delivery angling across Yuvraj who shapes to play it before withdrawing his bat away at the last minute
shuffles across to jab it to backward point
fires in a bouncer, Yuvraj drops his wrists and sways away
on the hips, Yuvraj gets off the mark with a tickle to fine leg. Patel's throw comes in and goes through midwicket and Bell doesn't back up properly.
leans well forward to push to the off side
That was some shot. It was a length delivery on the off stump line and Raina punched it up and over long-off.  Tremendous bottom-hand there.
leans across to defend the length delivery to the off side
fuller, outside off stump, driven to covers
from slightly wide of the crease, full and slanted across Raina who pushes it to right of cover
down the leg side and they appeal for a caught-down-leg decision and Tiffin says it's a wide.
angled across Yuvraj who lets it fly past him
gets forward to defend to covers
on the middle and off line, jabbed to the off side
short delivery, at the body, Yuvraj pulls it away ungainly down to fine leg
leans forward to defend to the on side
138.5 kmph fullish delivery, around the off stump, Raina drives to covers.
length delivery on the off stump line, Yuvraj squeezes it past square leg
And he pushes this full length delivery to long-off for a single
full pitched delivery and Yuvraj drives well to the right of mid-of where KP makes a fine diving stop. Ian Bell applauds.
tad short in length, around middle stump line, pushed to covers. He has this habit of punching on the up, two short covers waiting for that.
hmm goes for the good old slog this time and ends up dragging it to mid-on
Sharp and well-directed bouncer and Yuvraj takes his eyes off the ball but goes through with the awkward pull and connects.
hurls across another bouncer and Yuvraj pulls it to deep backward square leg boundary.
the slower one this time and Yuvraj drives to mid-off
comes down the track, moves outside leg and slices the short-of-length delivery angling away to wide third man
stands tall to punch a back-of-length delivery rather sweetly to mid-off.

goes for the yorker, ends up short of the blockhole and just outside off but Yuvraj tackles it really well. He opened the bat-face and guided it past the solitary slip for the third boundary of the over.
gets back and across to defend a short-of-length delivery to the off side
fuller, Raina is caught at the crease, lunges forward to push it to the on side of the pitch
short in length, slanted across Raina who punches it to deep point region
141.7 kmph fullish delivery, lands outside off stump and Yuvraj taps it to backward point
138.3 kmph length delivery, angled across Yuvraj who lets Prior gather that. Good delivery. Keep it there James.
straighter and Yuvraj punches it to long-off for a single
floated on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
flatter trajectory, on the leg and middle, tucked past square leg and Yuvraj rushes back for the second run
fires this one flat and down leg. Wide.
slower, on the middle and leg, defended to the on side
goes back to punch the ball on the leg and middle line to long-on
Raina works this one to deep square leg for a single
really full in length, around off stump, driven to long-off for a single
stays back to push it to cover point for a single.
leans forward to push it to sweeper cover for a single
rotates the strike with a punchy stroke to long-off
tries to get another single but can't beat backward point

Raina decides to indulge himself. Enough of tuk tuk cricket. He swung a back-of-length delivery on the middle stump over wide midwicket. He had changed his bat a short while back and has decided to test the new piece of wood.
retains the strike with a dab through the off side
on the leg stump line, turned behind square for a single
gets forward to drive to long-off
floated full on the boot, worked past square for a single
again lands full outside leg, swept straight to short fine-leg
shifts his line to outside off and Yuvraj drives to long-off. Four men inside the circle
Raina helps himself to his third six of the innings. A dash down the track and a heave over wide long-on.
pushes it well outside off and Yuvraj can't reach it
Yuvraj is struggling with his back. He held his back immediately after punching on the up to long-off
lovely well-directed bouncer on the middle stump and Raina does well to drop his wrists, get his bat down and sway away from the line
short-pitched delivery on the middle, tapped close on the off side for a quick single
on the middle and leg, from back of length, turned to midwicket
gets well behind the line of a length delivery and pushes it past the bowler
short in length and width offered outside off and Raina cuts but finds the man at sweeper cover
banged in short, at the hips, tucked to short fine-leg region for a single
Beaten by a peach. It kicked up from a length and rushes past the outside edge
goes for the big one but drags it of the inner edge to backward square leg
times it well but straight to mid-off but it's fumbled there
Big hit. Fuller and Yuvraj lifts it high over long-on. For the first time Flintoff overpitched it a bit and paid for it.
driven to the off side
goes for the big swing across the line but edges it one bounce to Prior
moves outside leg and Harmison follows him and Raina can only push it to backward point
fires in a yorker now - fab over so far - dug out to the off side
feisty square cut. Short in length and a fraction wide, Yuvraj arched back to creat more room and cut it past backward point
Wallop! It has landed on the roof. Short boundaries all right but he has cleared it easily. Clean full swing of the bat and the white ball soars over long-on. Ho hum.
the slower one, full and just outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to run it down to third man but can't connect
full pitched delivery, driven in the air wide of long-off for couple of runs
backs away and pushes a full toss to cover standing at the edge of the circle
moves outside leg, Flintoff tries to go for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss outside off, Yuvraj reaches out and scoops it to deep cover
full pitched on the off and middle line, Raina stays adjacent to the line and drives well to the right of long-off
Caught by the diving Collingwood at backward point. Dipping low full toss outside off, Raina slices it to right of Colly who dives to take it. India have lost their third wicket.
fires in a yorker first up, pushed to the off side
Slower one and it disappears at rapid pace to the long-off boundary. He moved outside leg, waited before clearing it down the ground. 50 up for Yuvi. His 38th ODI fifty.
runs this one to third man for a single
141.4 kmph short pitched delivery and YK Pathan pulls it weakly to midwicket. India 247 for 4.
full in length, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
Crashes that through the off side. It was full and outside off stump, that bottom hand drives the square drive and the ball flashes through the off side field
shuffles across, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
starts off with a low full toss outside off stump, mistimes the drive back to the bowler
fullish, outside off stump, squeezed off the outer edge to third man
slips in the slower one, full and on the middle and off line, pushed to cover
banged in short, Dhoni goes for the pull but bottom edges it in front of him. Tight over so far.
Another slower one, on a length, around middle and leg, nudged to the on side for a single.
moves outside leg, Broad, from round the stumps, fires it in short and Yuvraj pulls through wide midwicket
Samit floats it around off stump, driven to long-off for a single
gets forward to drive to long-on
slightly short and Dhoni pulls to deep midwicket region
skips down the track and whips to left of deep midwicket
floated full on the middle and leg, driven to left of long-off for couple of runs
driven to sweeper cover for a single
edged past the diving 'keeper. It straightened around the off stump, squarig up Dhoni who pushed at it. And Harmison makes a fine tumbling diving stop near the ropes
really full in length outside off stump, Dhoni squeezes it behind the stumps
slightly short in length, mistimes the pull to the on side. Broad is mixing things up very well.
wide outside off stump, it goes right over the wide line.
slower one, short in length, Dhoni early into the pull and drags it to short fine-leg
nice. Another slower one from short in length and Yuvraj is early into the pull and misses it completely
comes down the track, Patel shortens the length and hit back to him
bit more air and Dhoni swings it to wide midwicket boundary
leans across to square drive it to left of deep point region
gets Yuvraj on strike with a drive to long-off
pretty full and around off stump, pushed down to long-off
comes down the track, Samit keeps it really full, that bottom-hand comes down and the ball rolls to right of long-off
Six over cover point. Yuvraj walked down the track, Broad, from round the stumps, fired it outside off and Yuvi reached out to slice it over the ropes. Made it look very easy.
the short-pitched delivery arrives and Yuvraj pulls off the front foot.
misses out on the third boundary. It was a full toss and he carved it to third man
The slow bouncer is in and Dhoni is early into his pull, gets a glove on it but it falls short of Prior
bangs it fast and short, cut to point
low full toss outside off stump,  driven to sweeper cover

Big swing of the bat, despairing dive near the ropes. The story of the day so far. Dhoni comes out to hit a high full toss to deep square leg  region where Anderson almost gets a hand to the ball with a dive to his right
driven hard but straight to long-off
That lunging slog sweep is out in display. Yuvraj special. Down on one knee and hit cleanly over midwicket boundary. Easy on the eye. 300 up.
yorker length almost, dug out past the diving bowler, down to long-on
low full toss and Dhoni drives to left of long-on where Bell makes a diving stop
threatens to jump out before whipping it high and to the wide midwicket boundary. The run flood continues.
short in length, straightening outside off, punched to long-off
low full toss on the legs, Yuvraj doesn't move his feet, just bends his knee and flicks it over to deep square leg
wide outside off. India 310 for 4.
short in length, around the off stump, Dhoni stays back to push it to covers.
Slam bang crash wallop continues. Stand and deliver. Full toss outside off stump, thrashed to cover boundary.
the slower one. Yuvraj is beaten, checks his pull and it bobs up of the edge but lands safely in the mid-on region
full in length and Dhoni brings his bottom-hand into play. That unique twirl of the bat and the ball flies over long-off.
Full in length, whipped over to deep midwicket. Yuvraj needs six from the next ball to equal Azhar's fastest Indian ton record.
Azhar can't be beaten. Not today at least. Just a single down to deep midwicket
attempted yorker, dug out towards long-on
very skilful shot to get to 99. It was on the length around middle and leg stump line, Yuvraj stayed adjacent to the line and flicked it over backward squareleg
short in length, just outside leg, Yuvraj shuffles to short-arm pull it but misses

100 for Yuvi with a drive to long-on. The dressing room celebrates as Yuvraj pumps his fist and roars. Dhoni is across to congratulate. What an entertaining knock this has been. Good clean swings of the bat. Dazzling stuff. It's the second fastest hundred by an Indian. This is the fastest hundred against England beating Jayasuriya's 72- ball effort
the bouncer and Yuvraj can't connect with his pull shot
Rubbish delivery. Full toss at a comfortable height and Yuvraj knives it over wide long-on
good comeback delivery. Banged in short, beats the pull and thuds into groin.
dug out to the on side
What a shot. Stunning. It was full and outside off and Yuvraj brought his bat down and sort of chipped it like you do in golf. And the ball kept flying. Sucked by the crowd at long-off.
gets off strike with a push through the off side
goes for the yorker, low full toss results, Dhoni edges it behind square leg
cleaned up. Full, straight, on the middle, Dhoni shapes to whip it across the line, misses and the middle stump is knocked back.
driven through covers for a single
full and on the middle and leg, flicks it sweetly to deep square leg. He is timing them really sweetly
on the middle stump line, driven down to long-on
With the fine leg up in the circle, he bowls it full, on the legs - come-hit-me type delivery and Yuvraj flicks it up and over the leg side
ends his spell with a fine delivery: yorker on the middle and off, dug out to the off side
Highlights continue. Adjectives are out of stock here. Short in length and Yuvraj rocks back to play an nonchalant pull to wide midwicket.
Fuller, outside off stump, Yuvraj tries to clear long-on and edges it through the vacant slip region.
slips in the yorker this time and Yuvraj brings his bat down in a hurry to nudge it to third man
Delicious inside-out drive. Rohit backed away and unfurled an elegant extra-cover drive
driven down to long-off for a single
Outrageous. That Golf shot again. He brings his bat down and just chips it. And the ball flies low and hard to long-on boundary.
slower one, full and outside off, driven to covers, Gambhir, the runner for Yuvraj, wanted the single but Rohit doesn't respond
banged in short, pulled for a single
really full delivery outside off, Yuvraj tries to steer it to third man and gets a thickish top edge and past diving Prior.
the slower short-of-length delivery, checks his pull shot and they will get a single to right of deep midwicket
moves outside leg, low full toss outside off, Rohit reaches out to dab it to right of wide third man where Anderson makes a diving stop
the slower ball and Rohit runs it to third man for a single. End of the Indian innings. 387 for 5.

inn2.comm: on the middle and leg, full in length, flicked for a single. Munaf Patel makes the stop at long leg
straightening on the middle stump line, worked past square leg for couple of runs
length delivery, 135 kmph, angling away, pushed to covers
on the middle, trying to trap him lbw, Prior gets his across in time and works it to long leg
around the off stump and Bell leans forward to push it to mid-off
short in length, around the middle stump, placed wide of midwicket for a single
134.3 kmph back-of-length delivery outside off stump, pushed to short cover point
Bell brings up England's first boundary with a nice punchy drive off the back foot through the off side
short in length again, punched to Raina at extra cover
135.3 kmph length delivery curving away from Bell who lets Dhoni collect that
137.8 kmph back of length delivery through the off-stump channel, left alone
135.7 kmph straightens around off stump, squeezed down to third man
134.2 kmph, lands on a length, moves towards middle and off stump, defended to on side of the pitch
pushed towards mid-off and they get across in time for the single
beaten outside the off stump. It was slanted across Prior who hangs his bat out, away from the body
133.8 kmph back-of-length delivery moving towards the off stump, defended back to the bowler
134.7 kmph tight full delivery around the middle stump line, pushed to mid-on
fuller, around the off stump, Prior shapes to cover drive and edges it to mid-on but will get a quick single
137.4 kmph length delivery around the off stump and Prior pushes it to cover
Munaf gets the first wicket. Prior is back. It was slanted across Prior who was sucked into the chase and edged it to first slip where Sehwag held on.
shuffles across, gets outside off almost and drives to mid-on
139.5 kmph delivery curving away from Owais Shah who lets it to go through to Dhoni
138.4 kmph length delivery whizzing through the channel, left alone
gets forward to drive to mid-off
deftly cut late past the solitary slip. It was angling away from him, he waited before opening the bat face at the last minute
on a length, around middle stump line, tries to work it through wide midwicket but can't wrist it away as he wanted and the ball rolls to the on side of the pitch
fuller, on the middle, going for that lbw, Bell brings his bat around the front pad to push it to mid-on
angles this outside off, run down to Munaf at third man

Good catch by Sehwag, diving to his left at first slip. Zaheer hurled it full and across Shah, who was squared up completely and got a thickish edge; the ball flew to left of Sehwag, standing wide, and he did well to lunge to his left to take the catch. England are wobbling here at Rajkot.
in the off stump channel and KP covers the off stump before shouldering arms
short in length, around 138 kmph delivery, dabbed to third man for a single
just short of Harbhajan at midwicket and he signals that it didn't carry. Pietersen whipped the full delivery to Harbhajan who dived forward.
length delivery coming in, worked to the on side
hits the good length, around off stump, tapped close on the off side
creamed through the off side. It was back of length and a tad wide outside off and Bell hit it on the up and through cover point
closer to the off stump, guided to left of backward point
full and angling across Bell who leans forward to defend
on the hips, runs away to short fine-leg region
on that middle and leg line, full, Pietersen wrists it along the ground to midwicket
135.3 kmph length delivery beats the defensive prod and strikes the pad. Would miss the off stump, though.
fuller, 137.9 kmph, angling across Pietersen and Dhoni gathers
similar line, KP shuffles across and pushes the bat inside the line and squeezes it to the off side of the pitch
leans forward to defend a length delivery
almost scooped to extra cover. It was on the middle and leg and straightening, Bell shapes to work it to the on side and gets a leading edge to covers. It was a nice little leg cutter
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
jumps down the track and pushes it to mid-on for a quick single
moves forward to defend to covers
short in length, just outside off stump, steered to third man
whips it down on a length and angles it across Bell who guides to cover point
fuller, just outside off stump, Bell mistimes the drive back to Zaheer
short in length, around the off stump, Bell pulls uppishly, one bounce to mid-on
slower ball, on the elgs, turned to long leg
walks down the track and across as well, tries to flick a short of length delivery, misses and it goes over the leg stump
pushes towards mid-off where it's fumbled by Kohli and they steal an extra run. Had he picked the ball cleanly, the first run would have been tight. Very tight.
short in length and bouncing towards off stump, Bell defends to the off side of the pitch

collision between KP and Munaf. It was pushed close on the leg side, Pietersen ran for the single, Munaf ran for the ball and boom crash. Luckily, no one is injured. Pietersen was on the ground but recovered
a loud shout for a catch down leg as Pietersen shuffles across, tries to glance and there was a noise. It could have brushed the thigh pad
worked wide of square leg for a single
short and width but cut straight to backward point
pitches on a length and he on-drives the ball to  mid-on
shuffles around and works this one from middle stump to midwicket
edged and taken! Zaheer angles one wider across Bell, who cannot resist having a nibble when he sees width and succeeds in getting a nick to an ecstatic Dhoni, England three down
back of a length, shaping back to Flintoff, who goes back and gets a thin inside edge back onto his boot as he defends
top shot, gets on top of the bounce and punches it past cover-point

two in the over! Now Flintoff departs to one that pitches on a length just outside leg stump and striking him on the knee roll to hit him in front of middle stumps ... he's given out but thats a harsh call from the umpire
and he starts off with a wide a mile outside off stump, Pietersen reaches out and tries to get bat on it but cannot touch it
short ball and he gets tall but mistimes it to the man at cover
short of a length but he too mistimes the attempted cut to cover
another shuffling cut shot off the back foot, to Rohit at cover
gets across and cuts well again, but cant beat Raina in the covers
shuffles across and hangs the bat out limply, biting his tongue as the ball takes the inside edge and rolls perilously close to his leg stump, Pietersen calls him
shuffles across, plays the flick, gets hit high on the pad outside the line
pulls back on the shot as he comes forward and half-defends at that one, pitched on a length and going away from the bat
this one gets some lift of a great length, zipping past the bat again
finally gets bat on this one, a forward push to Raina in the covers
good shot from Collingwood, shuffling across and clipping a fuller ball off his pads and in front of midwicket for a boundary to ease the nerves
eight in two balls, this boundary the result of a smart open-faced defensive off the front food, edged down and wide of Sehwag at slip
and beats the bat with a pearl, pitching outside off stump and coming back in to just skim the outer edge of Collingwood's bat as he tries to defend
shuffles and pushes the ball past RP, mid-on does the fielding
a touch shot this, all wrists and placement from Pietersen, who gets across his stumps and effortlessly flicks it away between two fielders
gets across the sticks and drives hard to mid-on, where Pathan dives
better length, shorter, and it draws a defensive from Pietersen
classy shot again from KP, whipping out another trademark flick across the line, beating a diving Harbhajan at midwicket for another sumptuous boundary
make it three in the over, courtesy a stunning straight drive past mid-off
in the channel and Collingwood is beaten on the forward prod. Munaf smiles.
stays back to force the length delivery but straight to backward point. He practises the shot again.
from close to the stumps - he gets pretty close that helps him to maintain an excellent wicket-to-wicket line- defended down the track
punched to sweeper cover region where Sehwag stops the ball
walks right across the stumps, tries to flick, misses and it runs off the pad
short in length, pushed to covers.
full in length, on the middle and off, the bat face shuts a bit when he drives and the ball rolls to mid-on
shuffles across - he has done it repeatedly- and flicks to deep square leg
fires it on the leg stump, which was exposed by the shuffling Collingwood and he flicks it to fine-leg boundary
shifts his line to outside off, pushed to left of cover where Suresh Raina makes a fine diving stop.
beaten on the drive. It was angled across from a length and Pietersen went for the on-the-up drive but ..
short-pitched delivery and pulled down to the ground and down to deep square leg
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
charges down the track and pushes it back down the track
floated on the middle, paddled away for a single
full and on the middle, driven to long-on
goes for the sweep and gets a single to deep square leg
comes down the track and drives to long-off
short in length, angling away, dabbed wide of Zaheer at third man for couple of runs
from round the stumps, outside off stump, driven to covers
around the good length region, just outside off, defended to the off side
And facebook arguments might get difficult today for the Englishmen. From round the stumps, RP gets one to straighten a touch outside off and Collingwood has a lame poke at it. Gone!
down the leg side and Dhoni collects
punched to left of cover where Raina makes another excellent diving stop.
leans forward and drives straight to Raina
stays back to push to the on side of the pitch
outside off stump, dabbed to right of backward point for a single
leans forward to drive to long-on
gets forward and rotates the strike with a push to sweeper cover
charges down the track and lifts it cleanly over long-on. Pietersen is not going to die wondering.
floated on the middle, turned to midwicket
turns in from the off stump, wristed to midwicket
turning in, whipped in the air but clear of midwicket
comes down the track but drives to midwicket
flicked past square leg for a single
turns in from outside off, worked to midwicket
on the off and middle line, worked to backward square leg
turned past square leg for a single
slightly short in length ,cut to point

Pietersen was beaten in the flight as Pathan slowed up the pace and shortened the length but Pietersen lunged forward to heave it over long-on  and cleared the stand! For a moment it looked like a mishit. Ah well ... What a batsman.
low dipping full toss and KP whips it past the diving midwicket fielder for another boundary
Third boundary of the over. Flighted outside off and KP strode forward to crash it left of long-off.
rotates the strike to KP with a flick to the on side
full, on the middle, driven to left of long-on for a single
reaches forward to wrist the full one to wide long-on for couple of runs
slows up the pace, turns in from outside off, defended to covers
The sixes keep coming here at Rajkot. Stick Cricket continues. Patel this time gets in the act. Down the track and swings it over long-on. Easy.
lands outside off, Patel shapes to push it to covers and edges to the on side
quick and flat, turning in towards the off stump, defended to the on side
fires it in full, on the middle, wristed to deep midwicket region
really full in length, outside off, nudged to left of short third man. Really different release. Almost a bent middle finger. The seam was facing slip as it went down the wicket.
on the off and middle line, turned to the on side
on the off stump line, worked through midwicket
gets to his fifty with a drive through the on side. Captain KP standing tall.
flicked past square leg
The ball has landed on the roof. Patel dashed down the track and lofted it high over long-on. The ball has been changed.
turning to the off stump, on the back foot and back to the bowler
comes down the track and times it sweetly to long-off
again down the wicket and turned to square leg
flighted full, on the middle, driven to long-on
goes on the back foot to punch it to long-off
fires it in a yorker , driven back to the bowler
really full again, on the leg stump line, turned to deep midwicket
low full toss, on the middle stump line, worked past the diving midwicket fielder
low full toss and punched down town, past the bowler and well clear of the long-on fielder
spins down leg side and Dhoni gathers
around the middle and leg, turned to YK Pathan at deep midwicket
comes down the track, Sehwag shortens the length and Pietersen drags it just wide of the diving RP singh at long-on
picks a single by pinging RP
dragged through the on side field for a single
chips down the track and flicks to Brother Yo at deep midwicket

Done in by the doosra. Patel charged down. Panic. Desperate swing. Air. Death knell. Patel couldn't reach the pitch of the ball, tried to chase it as it turned away but couldn't connect. Harbhajan signals bye bye to him.
turns in towards the middle and leg, worked past square leg
slower, turning in, glanced to short fine leg
on the middle stump line, full, worked to short fine-leg region
worked behind square leg for a single
turns in to the middle, defended to the on side

KP is run out by Rohit Sharma. It was pushed to left of covers, Rohit picks and fires in a low throw, Dhoni lunges, collects, and breaks the stumps. Third umpire says out. KP already knows it. The crowd roar. England slip further.
floated on the off stump line, paddled to fine leg
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
turned behind square leg for a single
turning from outside off, dabbed to the off side
leans forward and ends up chipping over cover. Catch it  was the cry. Too high, though
again lobbed over the infield.
spinning in from outside off, nudged to the off side
flighted outside off, square driven through cover point
reaches forward to paddle it to fine-leg for a single
shortish and quick, defended down the track
leans forward to drive to cover
well forward and drives to long-on
from round the stumps, quick and flat, just outside off, driven to sweeper cover
paddled from outside off for a single
quick and flat, turned to midwicket
beaten on the cut. Bit of extra bounce and Dhoni gathers
really quick delivery and dabbed to the off side
slows up the pace, flighted delivery, pushed to long-on
Dropped by Sehwag at first slip. It was the quicker one outside off, really full in length, Broad stabbed it to left of Sehwag who couldn't hold on. It was traveling.
leans forward to defend
goes right back to work a delivery from the off stump to deep midwicket
slightly short, spinning in from outside off, cut to deep point
on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
drifts in, driven to long-on for a single
on the back foot and pushed back to the off side of the pitch
low dipping full toss and driven to long-on
lands short in length outside off, pushed to cover
from round the stumps this over, slow and flighted outside off, driven to sweeper cover
back over for the right hander, on the leg and middle, flicked for a single
fires it in at some pace, pushed past the diving Harbhajan
on the off and middle line, defended back to the bowler
full and outside off, driven to long-off for a single
flighted on the leg stump line, knocked around to deep midwicket
on the off stump line, punched off the back foot to cover
Caught at long-off? No RP says it didn't carry. It was lofted towards RP who moved in and lunged forward but it fell just short of him and he signals immediately that it didn't carry
leans forward to defend
There comes the slog sweep. Down on his knee and swung over midwicket boundary
floated full and down the leg side, misses the sweep shot
on the middle and off, full, dug out back to the bowler
biffed over mid-on. Harbhajan flights it around off stump and Broad swings it over the infield
fires in a full toss on the middle, Broad paddles it to the fine-leg boundary. Two in two. Next is what as that ad says
sliced off the outer edge to backward point region
slower but on the leg stump line, swept to long leg
slow through the air, Broad goes hard into the drive and mistimes it back to the bowler
full toss, Broad can't put it away; hit back to the bowler
driven through the on side for a single
on the middle and leg, Broad gets under it and swing it over midwicket. But gets more elevation than necessary but it drops safely in the cow corner
Again too much elevation and it drops into Gambhir's hands at long-on. Eight wickets down. Bopara now, no one is going to argue hopefully, left with tail enders
friendly full toss and Bopara clubs it to deep midwicket boundary
biffed away. He went down on his knee and didn't propose. But sent the ball soaring over midwicket
Harmison is run out. It was turned to Harbhajan Singh at short fine-leg and they go for the risky single. The throw comes in right on target and Dhoni breaks the stumps.
almost holed up at deep midwicket. It was slog swept to the boundary and  Rohit dives over the ropes and lands on his elbow. It could have been dangerous.. Careful boy.
goes back to cut through cover point for a boundary
on the back foot, pushed to the off side
goes for the cut but can't connect
leans forward to defend to the off side
flighted outside off stump, driven through covers. Superbly struck.
reaches his fifty and sends notice to KP with a slog sweep.
drags it to deep midwicket for a single
Game over. Fired in full and straight, Anderson misses the attempted paddle. Hawk eye suggets it would have turned and missed the off stump. India have won by 158 runs.
